trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection string used to establish the initial connection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the time to wait while establishing a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx $xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is determined by the specific type of connection that you are using.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the current database after a connection is opened, or the database name specified in the connection string before the connection is opened.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the database server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a string that represents the version of the server to which the object is connected.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The version of the database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The format of the string returned depends on the specific type of connection you are using.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a string that describes the state of the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The format of the string returned depends on the specific type of connection you are using.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when the state of the event changes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the isolation level for the transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the isolation level for the transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Changes the current database for an open connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the name of the database for the connection to use.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The cancellation instruction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Begins a database transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that represents the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that represents the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
